examples.example: 妈妈细心地为我擦拭着伤口上的药水。

translate.english: Mother carefully wiped the medicine on my wound for me.

examples.example: 爷爷轻轻地把药水倒在棉花上，准备为我处理伤口。

translate.english: Grandfather gently pours the liquid medicine onto the cotton, preparing to treat my wound.

examples.example: 我小心地拿着药水，准备给受伤的小动物进行擦拭。

translate.english: I carefully hold the potion, preparing to wipe it on the injured small animal.
